titleStmt.title: Simon B. Buckner, Receipt to Henry Beyrodt
CWG1396

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1859-1862

body.p:
Louisville, June 15, 1861.
Commonwealth of Kentucky
To Henry Beyrodt Dr,
1861
May 31. To 500 Haversacks @ 18Â¢ 90.00
June 15. " 500 " " " 90.00
$180.00

Recd payment
Head Quarters Ky State Guard
Louisville 19 June 1861.

I hereby certify that the 1000 Haversacks mentioned in the foregoing account of Henry Beyrodt were made and delivered by Said Beyrodt under my order for the use of the Kentucky State Guard at thie price therein charged. I approve Said account was made under the provisions of an act Entitled "an Act to Carry into Effect certain provisions of an Act for the better organization of the Militia," approved April 4, 1861. I approve said account.
